text: (ai rasool) eemaan laane vaalon ka dushaman sabase badhake yahoodiyon aur musharikon ko paoge aur eemaanadaaron ka dostee mein sabase badhake qareeb un logon ko paoge jo apane ko nasaara kahate hain kyonki in (nasaara) mein se yaqeenee bahut se aamil aur aabid hain aur is sabab se (bhee) ki ye log haragiz shekhee nahin karate
